summary: Investigated Blade code displaying as text in admin dashboard. Verified that the view compiles correctly (no Blade directives in compiled view). The issue is likely browser cache showing old HTML with unprocessed Blade code. Cleared all server-side caches (view, config, route, application, optimization). User needs to do a hard browser refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R) to clear browser cache and see the properly compiled view.
current_status: View compiles correctly on server side. All server caches cleared. The Blade code appearing as text is likely due to browser cache. User should perform a hard refresh to see the properly rendered view.
